availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Marshall County, Kentucky, farmer. North Carolina native. Married to Mary Ann Hardy Wade on December 24, 1840. Father of Asberry H. Wade, Rufus E. Wade, and Mary Anne Wade. Farmer in Henry County, Tennessee, in 1850. Owned one enslaved person in Henry County in 1850. Farmer in Marshall County in 1860. Owned two enslaved persons in Marshall County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Henry County, District 11, p. 340A.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Tennessee, Henry County, District 11.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marshall County, p. 127.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Marshall County, p. 5.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marshall County, Staton District, p. 17.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, County Marriages, Film #001942719, p. 382.
